ins:
Open your browser of choice.
Enter https://facebook.com in the address bar.
Click in the upper right corner, and open settings.
Click on 'Your Facebook information' in the side bar menu.
Click on 'View' under the 'Download your information' tab.

1. Select JSON for data format.
2. Select media quality (recommended low if you want a small filesize).
3. Finally click 'Create File'.
In a couple of hours check your Facebook notifications.</br> Click on the one saying "Your Facebook information file is ready to download."
Finally download your zip file by clicking on the "Download".</br> You will be prompted for your password.
